content: shoulders these 2 row form rib and slip_stitch edging ensuring you do not cast off too tightly cont as folls work in rib with edging for a further 3 row ending with ws cast off 7 7 8 9 10 sts at beg of next 8 2 4 6 8 row facing for next row cast off 8 9 10 - sts at beg of next 6 4 2 - row 5 sts next row ws patt to end decrease 1 0 1 0 1 st at beg of row cast off rem 5 sts 28 31 34 37 40 sts change to 8mm us 11 needles beg with a k row work in st st throughout as folls keeping 3 sts slip_stitch edging as set beg with a k row cont in st increase 1 st at each end of 3rd and every foll alt row to 37 37 39 41 45 sts st with slip st edging until work matches back to start of shoulder then on every 4th row until there are 43 45 47 49 51 sts shaping ending with ws facing for next row cont without shaping until sleeve meas 24 25 26 26 26 cm ending shape shoulder with rs facing for next row ensuring you do not cast off too tightly cont as folls shape top next row ws cast off 7 7 8 9 10 sts patt to end ensuring you do not cast off too tightly cont as folls work 1 row cast off 6 6 7 7 7 sts at beg of next 6 row next row cast off 7 8 8 9 10 sts patt to end cast off rem 7 9 5 7 9 sts work 1 row next row cast off 7 8 9 9 10 sts patt to end making up work 1 row press as described on the information page cast off rem 7 8 9 10 10 sts join shoulder seams to markers either side of back neck place markers 22 23 24 25 26 cm down from shoulder to denote sleeves armhole join side seams to markers join sleeve seams using 6 5mm us 10½ needles cast on 27 29 29 31 31 sts sew in sleeves work in rib as given for back for 6 row ending with rs facing for next row change to 8mm us 11 needles 61 67 73 79 85 cm 24 26½ 28½ 31 33½ in if you re having difficulty viewing or printing our pdf
